body: this is not really the primary focus of the iot-core at the moment, but it is possible (see here) Normally, you deploy a UWP app from VisualStudio 2015 or create it as a UWP package from Visual Studio 2015 and deploy the package. This app can use any of the azure services and the local display (if headed) but does not require a web server. Here are plenty of samples, in particular one that installs a node.js web-server to serve http pages to clients if you need that. Personally, I prefer sending my data to the cloud and serving the web from there...
title: How to deploy Asp.net Core on a Windows 10 IoT device?
